value.string:
from Products.ZSQLCatalog.SQLCatalog import Query, ComplexQuery, NegatedQuery
 
 current_delivery = state_change['object']
 portal = current_delivery.getPortalObject()
 
 destroy_service_relative_url = portal.portal_preferences.getPreferredInstanceCleanupResource()
 
 sale_packing_list_line_list = current_delivery.contentValues(portal_type="Sale Packing List Line")
 assert len(sale_packing_list_line_list) == 1
 current_delivery_line = sale_packing_list_line_list[0]
 if current_delivery_line.getResource() != destroy_service_relative_url:
 return
 
 computer_partition = current_delivery_line.getAggregateValue(portal_type=["Computer Partition", "Slave Partition"])
 if computer_partition is None:
 raise ValueError("Sale Packing List Line '%s' should have a computer partition aggregated" % current_delivery_line.getRelativeUrl())
 else:
 # Mark computer partition as free
 # This method should be always callable in this step to prevent having 2 packing list related to the same computer partition
 computer_partition.markFree()
 
 # Deliver all SPL related to this software instance
 software_instance = current_delivery_line.getAggregateValue(portal_type="Software Instance")
 for sale_packing_list_line in portal.portal_catalog(
 portal_type="Sale Packing List Line", 
 default_aggregate_uid=software_instance.getUid(),
 simulation_state=NegatedQuery(Query(simulation_state="delivered")),
 ):
 sale_packing_list = sale_packing_list_line.getParentValue()
 if sale_packing_list.getPortalObject().portal_workflow.isTransitionPossible(sale_packing_list, 'start'):
 sale_packing_list.start()
 if sale_packing_list.getPortalObject().portal_workflow.isTransitionPossible(sale_packing_list, 'stop'):
 sale_packing_list.stop()
 if sale_packing_list.getPortalObject().portal_workflow.isTransitionPossible(sale_packing_list, 'deliver'):
 sale_packing_list.deliver()
 if sale_packing_list.getSimulationState() != 'delivered':
 raise ValueError('It was not possible to deliver %r during destruction of %r' (sale_packing_list.getRelativeUrl(), software_instance.getRelativeUrl()))
 # Remove unused open sale order line
 subscription_item = sale_packing_list_line.getAggregateValue(portal_type="Hosting Subscription")
 all_delivered = True
 for sale_packing_list_line in portal.portal_catalog(
 portal_type="Sale Packing List Line", 
 default_aggregate_uid=subscription_item.getUid(),
 simulation_state=NegatedQuery(Query(simulation_state="delivered")),
 ):
 if sale_packing_list_line.getSimulationState() != 'delivered':
 all_delivered = False
 if all_delivered:
 open_order_line = subscription_item.getAggregateRelatedValue(portal_type="Open Sale Order Line")
 if open_order_line is not None:
 # XXX: Mahybe system shall *NOT* work without Open Sale Orders
 open_order_line.getParentValue().manage_delObjects(open_order_line.getId())
